description: This table stores the queries sent to physicians as part of the Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) process.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CDI_QUERY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the type of the query sent to the provider.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CDI_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the provider who was sent the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) query.

columns.name: CDI_QUERY_RESP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a response was received from the provider for the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) query.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: CDI_DRG_CHNG_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason for the DRG change caused by the query.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
